contactName.title: Enter a contact name for client.

logo.title: Click button to upload client logo.

title.title: Enter the title for the concept.

client.title: Select the client for this concept

project.title: Select the project that this concept will belong to.

round.title: Select the round that this concept will be associated with.

addSlide.title: Select a template from the drop down and click button to add a slide.

slideNumber.title: Enter the order in which the slide will appear.

content.title: Enter the slide content. If this is a 2-col template, this content will appear in left column.

contentRight.title: Enter the slide content to appear in right column. If blank, online single column layout will be used.

dataX.title: Enter the slide position on the canvas X-Axis. Leave default for basic slide transitions.

dataY.title: Enter the slide position on the canvas Y-Axis. Leave default for basic slide transitions.

dataZ.title: Enter the slide depth relative to other slides during transition.  A negative value will make the slide appear below the others. Leave default for basic slide transitions.

dataRotate.title: Enter the degree that slide will rotate during transitions. A value of 360 will spin the slide in a circle once and so on. Leave default for basic slide transitions.

dataScale.title: Enter the the zoom of the slide during transitions. Leave default for basic slide transitions.

shortUrl.title: This is the short url link to view concept generated by bitly.
